species.name: ninetales
descriptions: According to an enduring legend, 9 noble saints were united and reincarnated as this Pokémon.
Each of its nine tails is imbued with supernatural power, and it can live for a thousand years.
It has long been said that each of the nine tails embody an enchanted power. A long-lived NINETALES will have fur that shines like gold.
It has nine long tails and fur that  gleams gold. It is said to live for  1,000 years.
It is said to live 1,000 years, and each of its tails is loaded with supernatural powers.

abilities.name: flash-fire
abilities.effect: Protects against fire moves.  Once one has been blocked, the Pokémon's own Fire moves inflict 1.5× damage until it leaves battle.

abilities.name: drought
abilities.effect: Summons strong sunlight that lasts indefinitely upon entering battle.
